channel.title: Upcoming SigHPCEdu Website Committee Events on AMC SIGHPC Education Chapter
channel.description: Upcoming events in the SigHPCEdu Website committee of the AMC SIGHPC Education Chapter

item.title: Tenth SC Workshop on Best Practices for HPC Training and Education BPHTE23 at 9:00 AM EST on Mon, Nov 11, 2023
item.description: Tenth SC Workshop on Best Practices for HPC Training and Education BPHTE23 Monday November 13, 2023 Time: 2:00 PM - 5:30 PM (MST) 2:00 PM-2:15 P.M HPC Education Training and Education: Challenges and Opportunities Nitin Sukhija, Slippery Rock University of Pennsylvania 2:15 PM-3:00 P.M Paper Session I 2:15 PM-2:30 P.M Expanding Horizons: Advancing HPC Education in Colombia through CyberColombia’s Summer Schools. Carlos Alvarez, Aurelio Vivas, Jose Manuel Monsalve Diaz, Harold Castro, Esteban Hernandez and Juan Lalinde
